mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_OVERHAUL_ITEM ( REC_ID, ITEM_NAME, ORDER_CODE, MODEL_NAME, OBJECT_CODE, OBJECT_NAME, WORK_USER_ID, WORK_USER_NAME, ITEM_TYPE, TRAIN_NUMBER, WORK_RESULT, INSPECT_ITEM_VALUE, WORK_TIME, DOC_ID, WORK_DETAIL, REMARK, ERROR_FLAG, ITEM_UNIT, DEFAULT_VALUE, MAX_VALUE, MIN_VALUE, MUTUAL_INSPECTION_PEOPLE, MUTUAL_INSPECTION_PEOPLE_ID, SPECIAL_INSPECTION_PEOPLE, SPECIAL_INSPECTION_PEOPLE_ID, MODEL_SEQUENCE, SEQUENCE_ID, TDMER02_ID, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5, OBJECT_ID) VALUES ( #{recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inspectItemValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mutualInspectionPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mutualInspectionPeopleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialInspectionPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialInspectionPeopleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelSequence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sequenceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tdmer02Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
